scripts.start:bisect: npm install && npm run build:clean && npm run start
scripts.start:clean: npm install && npm run build:clean && npm run generate && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build:pre && npm run build:post
scripts.build:full: npm run build:pre && npm run generate && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:post
scripts.build:pre: npm run build:clean && npm run generate:before-build && npm run build:typescript
scripts.build:minimal: npm run generate:before-build && npm run build:typescript
scripts.build:clean: npm run build:clean:build && npm run build:clean:typescript
scripts.build:clean:typescript: find src -name '*.map' -type f -delete && find src -name '*.js' -type f -delete && find src -name '*.d.ts' ! -name 'modules.d.ts' -type f -delete
scripts.build:clean:pristine: npm run build:clean && npm run build:clean:generated
scripts.generate: npm run build:minimal && npm run generate:types && npm run generate:schema && npm run generate:config
scripts.generate:before-build: npm run generate:stubs && npm run generate:config
scripts.generate:update-types: npm run generate:types && npm run generate:schema
scripts.generate:stubs: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' npx ts-node tools/types.ts stubs
scripts.generate:types: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' npx ts-node tools/types.ts full
scripts.screenshots:png: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' npx ts-node tools/screenshot.ts png
scripts.screenshots:gif: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' npx ts-node tools/screenshot.ts gif
scripts.test: npm run test:options && npm run test:type-generation && npm run test:coordinates_map
